ai-patthana8.58:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.58:1.1_0: The teaching should not be given up, nor cause, be given up, and conditioned by development.
ai-patthana8.58:2.1_0: Neither things should not be given up and not give up. The three things should be given up.
ai-patthana8.58:3.1_0: The teaching should not be given up, and not give up. Developing to the development of the path should be given up.
ai-patthana8.58:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
